hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_WH.CREATOR, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_WH.CREATE_TIME, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_WH.MODIFIER, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_WH.MODIFY_TIME, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_WH.REC_VER, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_WH.REC_STATUS, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_WH.ORG_ID, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_WH.PM_CODE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_WH.EOCW_ID, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_WH.EOCW_EOGP_PM_CODE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_WH.EOCW_EOCP_PM_CODE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_WH.EOCW_PRIORITY, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_WH.EOCW_ALTERNATIVE_WH_CODE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_WH.EOCW_ALTERNATIVE_WH_NAME, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_WH.TIME_ZONE from EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_WH EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_WH where 1=1 << and EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_WH.EOCW_EOGP_PM_CODE = :eocwEogpPmCode >> << and EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_WH.EOCW_EOCP_PM_CODE = :eocwEocpPmCode >> << and EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_WH.ORG_ID = :orgId>> order by EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_WH.EOCW_PRIORITY desc
